entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 10:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
